divs: Sighting DetailsMY AND MY KIDS WERE RIDING OUR BIKES WHEN WE SAW A ROUND WHITE UFO BLINKING A RED LIGHT. THIS UFO WAS WAY HIGH IN THE SKY AND IT WAS BEING CHASE BY 3 GIANTS AIRPLANES. I HAD NEVER SEEN 3 HUGE AIRPLANES FLYING IN AN INDIAN LINE, THEY LOOKED TO ME LIKE THEY WERE GOIN AFTER THAT OBJECT.
Summary: A BLINKING UFO WAS CHASED BY 3 BIG AIRPLANES
